about_the_game:
The complete soundtrack to POSTAL Redux (Remastered by Angel Marcloid @ Angel Hair Audio)

Rampage Tracks:

1 - Improvised Explosive Device
2 - Burn
3 - Cold Iron
4 - Run From Me
5 - Glorious
6 - Temporomandibular
7 - Dragged Away
8 - Hell Called
9 - Claptodeath
10 - Blood Path
11 - Shotgun Callosotomy
12 - Results

2 - Home

4 - The Outskirts
5 - Parade Of Disasters
6 - The Bridge
